game.name: Sherlock Holmes - Nemesis
game.shortDescription: This new Sherlock Holmes game sends us to 19th Century London where Arséne Lupin, a young French burglar with an impressive track record, has just challenged Scotland Yard and the most famous of detectives - Sherlock Holmes.
game.shortDescriptionEn: This new Sherlock Holmes game sends us to 19th Century London where Arséne Lupin, a young French burglar with an impressive track record, has just challenged Scotland Yard and the most famous of detectives - Sherlock Holmes.

reviewHighlights.text: I RECOMMEND SHERLOCK HOLMES - NEMESIS !! Amazing Game!! Interesting Story !! Adventure, Detective, Mystery, Investigation, Logic-Puzzles, Crime-Theft,...
